title: Oscars 2018: betting odds indicate Best Picture race remains open
text:
Oscars 2018: betting odds indicate Best Picture race remains open 2:02pm EST - 01:05 
The Best Picture Oscar race remains open, with ''Three Billboards'' and ''The Shape of Water'' competing as the most likely winners of the most hotly contested Academy Award, according to Ladbrokes. Edward Baran reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Best Picture Oscar race remains open, with "Three Billboards" and "The Shape of Water" competing as the most likely winners of the most hotly contested Academy Award, according to Ladbrokes.
